UnitsÂ¶

ClusterGB units generally follow the metal units from LAMMPS, i.e.

  • Distance = angstroms
  • Energy = eV
  • force = eV/angstrom
  • Temperature = Kelvin
  • Time = picoseconds

Etc. including derived units like volume. Two notable exceptions are that pressures are given in gigapascal (e.g. in cgb_bulk_modulus.py) and GB interfacial energies are given in millejoules per square meter (mJ/m^2).
